subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After a slow start, No. 2 L.S.U. showed again why it is the team to beat in the SEC by exploding for 28 consecutive points and dominating No. 12 South Carolina with its defense.
snippet: After a slow start, No. 2 L.S.U. showed again why it is the team to beat in the SEC by exploding for 28 consecutive points and dominating No. 12 South Carolina with its defense.
